pages.text:
Say you want to grow and harvest grapes without risking pesky mutations, luckily there's a block for that! The trellis allows you to not only stop mutation, but even grow grapes at a faster rate!

Trellises should be placed going east to west to ensure the grapes get the most sunlight throughout the day.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Trellises are easy to craft, nice to look at and extremely useful. I would go as far to call them an essential part of any good winery.

pages.title: Tools
pages.text:
A grape's growth can be accelerated using bonemeal, allowing you to very quickly populate a vineyard.

If you no longer want a grape bush on your trellis, use shears to remove it, yielding one bunch of grapes.

I would recommend placing your trellises in rows, populated by only one type of grape for ease of organisation.

Grapes should be grown outside (obviously), and can happily thrive in any climate, in this dimension or another.

Final note, if longer vineyards aren't your thing, trellises can be stacked atop each other to produce a logistical nightmare.
